title: Buying Snowdown Sweets for IP?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
It says here http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-crafting-2016 that Snowdown sweets will be purchasable for IP on the weekends.

Its Saturday, but i can't find any way of buying the sweets. I have tons of IP and i relish the chance to get rid of some when the very rare opportunity arises. 

Does anyone know why the Sweets aren't available? or when they will be?

Thanks

replies.body:
HAHA wow 2 candy each day....
like for real
ok so I only ever bought 3, and now the event is over, Im stuck with 3 and can't get rid of them.... what do i do rito plz

Does that mean if we bought our two today (Sunday here but still Saturday in the US), we can still buy another two when it's Sunday for the US since it apparently follows the US? Would love some clarification on this.

Problem Solution:
1. Go to the old client (which is accessible via the new client's login at the bottom right).

2. Go to accessories in the old client's shop.

3. Buy it for 200 IP.

4. Quickly before it's too late!

Worked for me so I hope it works for you!
It should also be on the new client; I just purchased them on there. Let me know if you run into any issues finding it!
For me I can get them now

its the weekend in the US in about 6 hours.

5pm EDT

I'm pretty sure by 'weekend' they meant **American** weekend. I guess it'll be available later today.
:3
